name: TXP_NEXT_REV_HX
description: Next review date history for transplant episodes.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_NEXT_REV_DT
columns.description: Stores the history of next review dates for the transplant episode.

columns.name: HX_NEXT_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who changed the next review date for the transplant episode.

columns.name: HX_NEXT_REV_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HX_NEXT_REV_INST
columns.description: Stores the instant on which the next review date for the transplant episode was changed.
